column5: Just got my Trombly's sale flyer. Decent deals.  Might be worth a look.
One of my favourite places. I love BPS, but I'm also a firm believer in supporting the local shops.
I like Troblys as well, it would just be nice if the store was double the size.  So much crap in there it's insane, lol..
Drive by the place every weekend on the way to Dally,when we get close my wife starts to snarly at me!!!

Was just checking out the link for the flyer...good deal on the Pflueger Arbor combo ($79.99).  IM8 graphite rod, and, a spinning reel made specifically for braid (no need for any backing)...I paid $89.99 on sale at CTC last year, used it mostly for walleye (drifting with harnesses) great little outfit for under $100!!!!!!!!!!!
